TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: here we are joining tables with spec_visual table. and also applied incremental logic.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_SPEC_VISUAL

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
select A.source_name AS source_name, A.CLIPPER_WI_REF AS CLIPPER_WI_REF, A.CLIPPER_ADVERTISER_REF AS CLIPPER_ADVERTISER_REF, A.VERSION_NUM AS VERSION_NUM, A.CURRENT_STATUS AS CURRENT_STATUS, A.CURRENT_STATUS_DATE AS CURRENT_STATUS_DATE, A.CANCEL_FLAG AS CANCEL_FLAG, A.NATIONAL_FLAG AS NATIONAL_FLAG, A.PUB_VERSION_NUM AS PUB_VERSION_NUM, A.PUBLISHER_CONTRACT AS PUBLISHER_CONTRACT, A.CLIPPER_BOOK_ID AS CLIPPER_BOOK_ID, A.PUB_AD_CODE AS PUB_AD_CODE, A.BOOK_EDITION AS BOOK_EDITION, A.WORKITEM_ID AS WORKITEM_ID, A.CLIPPER_REP_CODE AS CLIPPER_REP_CODE, A.BUSINESS_CENTRE_ID AS BUSINESS_CENTRE_ID, A.PUBLISHER_ID AS PUBLISHER_ID ,
PA.COLOUR_CODE AS COLOUR_CODE, W.BUNDLE_ID AS BUNDLE_ID, S.SALES_REP_CODE AS SALES_REP_CODE, B.BUSINESS_CENTRE_DESC AS BUSINESS_CENTRE_DESC, P.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME, A.LAST_MODIFIED AS AD_LAST_MODIFIED, W.LAST_MODIFIED AS WI_LAST_MODIFIED, A.PRODUCT_CYCLE_CODE AS PRODUCT_CYCLE_CODE from( SELECT 'spec' source_name, CLIPPER_WI_REF, CLIPPER_ADVERTISER_REF, VERSION_NUM, CURRENT_STATUS, CURRENT_STATUS_DATE, CANCEL_FLAG, NATIONAL_FLAG, NULL AS PUB_VERSION_NUM, NULL AS PUBLISHER_CONTRACT, CLIPPER_BOOK_ID, UDAC AS PUB_AD_CODE, NULL AS BOOK_EDITION, WORKITEM_ID, SALES_REP_CODE, CLIPPER_REP_CODE, BUSINESS_CENTRE_ID, PUBLISHER_ID, LAST_MODIFIED, NULL AS PRODUCT_CYCLE_CODE FROM SPEC_VISUAL ) A Left JOIN WORK_ITEM W ON A.WORKITEM_ID=W.WORKITEM_ID Left JOIN SALES_REPRESENTATIVE S ON A.CLIPPER_REP_CODE=S.CLIPPER_REP_CODE Left JOIN PUB_AD_CODE PA on A.PUB_AD_CODE=PA.PUB_AD_CODE Left JOIN BUSINESS_CENTRE B ON A.BUSINESS_CENTRE_ID= B.BUSINESS_CENTRE_ID left join PRODUCT P on P.PRODUCT_ID=W.PRODUCT_ID and P.WORKFLOW_DEFINITION_ID=W.WORKFLOW_DEFINITION_ID where A.last_modified>to_timestamp('$$last_spec_pull_dt','yyyyddmmhh24miss') or W.last_modified>to_timestamp('$$last_spec_wi_pull_dt','yyyyddmmhh24miss')

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: In this we are calculating max of last_modified from advert, spec, and wi_spec,wi_adv. creating source for mapping info table. applied group by on source name.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: AGG_MAPPING_INFO

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: here we are joining tables with advert table. and also applied incremental logic.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_ADVERT

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
SELECT 'adv' source_name, A.CLIPPER_WI_REF AS CLIPPER_WI_REF, A.CLIPPER_ADVERTISER_REF AS CLIPPER_ADVERTISER_REF, A.VERSION_NUM AS VERSION_NUM, A.CURRENT_STATUS AS CURRENT_STATUS, A.CURRENT_STATUS_DATE AS CURRENT_STATUS_DATE, A.CANCEL_FLAG AS CANCEL_FLAG, A.NATIONAL_FLAG AS NATIONAL_FLAG, A.PUB_VERSION_NUM AS PUB_VERSION_NUM, A.PUBLISHER_CONTRACT AS PUBLISHER_CONTRACT, A.CLIPPER_BOOK_ID AS CLIPPER_BOOK_ID, A.PUB_AD_CODE AS PUB_AD_CODE, A.BOOK_EDITION AS BOOK_EDITION, A.WORKITEM_ID AS WORKITEM_ID, A.CLIPPER_REP_CODE AS CLIPPER_REP_CODE, A.BUSINESS_CENTRE_ID AS BUSINESS_CENTRE_ID, A.PUBLISHER_ID AS PUBLISHER_ID ,
PA.COLOUR_CODE AS COLOUR_CODE, W.BUNDLE_ID AS BUNDLE_ID, S.SALES_REP_CODE AS SALES_REP_CODE, B.BUSINESS_CENTRE_DESC AS BUSINESS_CENTRE_DESC, P.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME, A.LAST_MODIFIED AS AD_LAST_MODIFIED, W.LAST_MODIFIED AS WI_LAST_MODIFIED, A.PRODUCT_CYCLE_CODE AS PRODUCT_CYCLE_CODE from ADVERT A Left JOIN WORK_ITEM W ON A.WORKITEM_ID=W.WORKITEM_ID Left JOIN SALES_REPRESENTATIVE S ON A.CLIPPER_REP_CODE=S.CLIPPER_REP_CODE Left JOIN PUB_AD_CODE PA on A.PUB_AD_CODE=PA.PUB_AD_CODE Left JOIN BUSINESS_CENTRE B ON A.BUSINESS_CENTRE_ID= B.BUSINESS_CENTRE_ID left join PRODUCT P on P.PRODUCT_ID=W.PRODUCT_ID and P.WORKFLOW_DEFINITION_ID=W.WORKFLOW_DEFINITION_ID where A.last_modified>to_timestamp('$$last_adv_pull_dt','yyyyddmmhh24miss') or W.last_modified>to_timestamp('$$last_adv_wi_pull_dt','yyyyddmmhh24miss')

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Here we have created batchnum, timestamp& checksum ports. and also doing some operations on some ports.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_BAT_TS_CHK

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: iif(isnull(LKP_PARAMETER_NAME),0, iif(PARAMETER_NAME1 = LKP_PARAMETER_NAME AND CURR_VALUE1 != LKP_CURR_VALUE,1,3))
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: flag

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Here we are unioning ports of SQ_advert and SQ_spec_visual.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: Uni_advert_spec
